item.title: Congressional leaders mourn Border Patrol agent gunned down near Canadian border
item.description: Republicans and Democrats expressed sorrow Tuesday after a Border Patrol agent was shot dead in Vermont while working near the Canadian border.

item.title: House GOP eyes birthright citizenship bill to back Trump's executive order

item.title: World Health Organization 'regrets' loss of U.S. support under Trump
item.description: The World Health Organization said Tuesday that it hopes President Trump will reconsider the U.S. pullout from the organization.
